ï¼ˆLike any mass movement, there’s a lot you don’t agree upon. But most of you are backing the Five Demands. This shows that you can find a common platform. But HK does not currently have a common agenda for the international community. To solve this issue, I would argue strongly for a consensus building project around Three Demands for the International Community )

But HK does not currently have a common agenda for the international community. To solve this issue, I would argue strongly for a consensus building project around Three Demands for the International Community )
